name: Beach Volleyball VR - Online!
description:
Play Beach Volleyball online with your friends! No controllers allowed! Use your real hands to have a quick pepper.

Instructions:

  1. Launch app and allow mic to talk.
  2. Walk over to the number pad on the left or teleport by pinching with the left hand and pointing to the target location with your palm.
  3. Type in a unique code for you and your friend to join. You can use any code, so long as no one else is using it.
  4. Have your friend type in the same code  on their end.
  5. Have fun!

This is Version 1. Hoping to add Meta Avatar support and cooler beaches in later versions.

Note: I'm currently only using the free version of a networking software which supports up to 30 people at a time. If this gets popular I'll pay the $50 a month for unlimited users, but I can't afford it right now. I don't think it will get that popular anyway, but please let me know if you run into any issues!
